response.overview: Inspired by ancient Scandinavian and English legends involving ghosts, demons, and pinning spirits to the earth, this short film centers on a farming family and a mother's fear. But is the legend true, or merely post-partum depression? Official project logline: When the neighboring farmer disturbs an old fence post, a little girl must seal an ancient boundary before a family demon returns.
response.title: Mending Fences
